summary: Russian voices fix for "Followers can Relax" mod.
descriptionHtml:
Bored of your silent followers or English voices in Russian version of "Followers can Relax" ?
Install this add-on and Lydia (and others) will be able to speak again.
Russian subtitles not included. This is only followers commands voice pack for translated version of "Followers can Relax" mod.

Tested on "Followers can Relax v6.35 (а)  rus v1.0 " but should work with others.

As a bonus, Lydia now doesn't speak like a slave. This stupid slave-dialogues are replaced to "Okey, lets go/Horosho, pojdem", "Good/Ladno", etc. And some others improvements..

How to Install:
- Install Russian version of "Followers can Relax" with English voices and copy "Data" folder with Russian voices to Skyrim root. Replace all files if needed.

Recommended to use with "Followers can Relax v6.35 (а)  rus v1.0".

[youtube]oHnRXInWdN8[/youtube]
author: Oketado
